text: Israel Moiseevich Gelfand, also written Israïl Moyseyovich Gel'fand, or Izrail M. Gelfand (, ; – 5 October 2009) was a famous Soviet mathematician. He worked on many branches of mathematics, including group theory and other areas related to differential equations. He received many awards, including the Order of Lenin and the first Wolf Prize, he was also a Foreign Fellow of the Royal Society and professor at Moscow State University, and worked at Rutgers University after immigrating to the United States shortly before his 76th birthday. ==Books== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Generalized Functions Volumes, 1-6, American Math Society, (2015) ==Other websites== *Israel Moiseevich Gelfand, dedicated site, maintained by Tatiana V.
